The goal of the process is keeping consistency across senior and core promotions. To ensure this, EPAM gathers international Committees of Experts that provide Candidates and their RMs with objective feedback and useful recommendations.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=BR0pe1Rl&resolution=1920x1080#\",\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(0, with other managers in requirements for senior roles\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a PM/DM, you may be asked to provide feedback about employee's achievements using the EPAM toolset. Your feedback will be added to the input materials of the Assessment request together with feedback from the Candidate's RM and other stakeholders. Upon receiving such a request, please provide your vision of the employee's achievements and experience shown on your project.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are interested in the process as a Candidate, please review this \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMASMT/I%27m+a+Candidate\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you would like to participate in the Assessment as an Expert, please take a look \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMASMT/How+to+become+an+Expert\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"or email\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:AskAssessment@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AskAssessment@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
